All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BeelinePlayer
 
CtfWorld
This class is a modified version of ActorWorld for use with the class's Capture the Flag competition
Flag
This class holds the special Actor for the game's Flag
Match
Class to set up a single Match between two Teams
MatchRunner
Class builds two Teams and starts a Match between them with few Rocks
Player
This class models a single Player.
RandomPlayer
 
SampleTeam
 
Team
The class defines a CTF Team, which consists of an ArrayList of 8 Players, a Flag, a team color, a team name, which side of the field the Team is on, and various instance variable to help determine the team's score throughout a match.
